name: Crepuscular Race
description:
Crepuscular Race | Trijam 164 entry

Goal: Finish the race to alternate between a Day and a Night (more difficult) phase.

Controls:  UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT

Unfortunately not in a very playable state yet. (First game jam in a team, and learning the engine while making the game: a lot of first times, a lot of learning, fun experience overall. Will try to finish the game after the jam!)

Team: Twann, MasterHans
Engine: Phaser (phaser.io)
Graphics: Potato Piskell (piskellapp.com)
